mk.imdb.core

Class IMDbAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • mk.imdb.core.IMDbAPI

  • public final class IMDbAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    Static class that offers methods for calling the imdbapi.org API.
    Author:
    Mirko Polato

      • fullSearchMovieByTitle

        public static IMDbResponseArray fullSearchMovieByTitle(IMDbSearchByTitleParameters params)
        Searches for movies by title. Gets all the results.
        Parameters:
        params - The list of parameters (Limit and Offset parameters will be ignored).
        Returns:
        The IMDb API (imdbapi.org) response object.
